original: de gnyis kyis blangs pa de ma shi la 'byor pa yod na bsam pa nyid du bya'o zhes bya ba la de gnyis kyi zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas gnyis dag gi'o //
analyzed: de gnyis kyis blangs pa de ma shi la 'byor pa yod na bsam pa nyid du bya'o zhes bya ba la de gnyis kyi zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas gnyis dag gi'o //
translated: In of those two, those two refers to the Sa·πÖgha and the Buddha.

original: sbyin du med na skyon med do //
analyzed: sbyin du med na skyon med do //
translated: If it is not for sale, there is no offense.

original: nad g-yog gis de la bsnyen bkur mi bya bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nad g-yog gis de la bsnyen bkur mi bya bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should not fail to attend to him.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni nad pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni nad pa la'o //
translated: To him refers to the sick person.

original: de'i tshig don dang ldan pa dang chos dang ldan pa bcag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i tshig don dang ldan pa dang chos dang ldan pa bcag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should not contradict his words that are meaningful and in accord with the Dharma.

original: don dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba la phan pa dang so sor yang dag par 'brel ba'o //
analyzed: don dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni 'tsho ba la phan pa dang so sor yang dag par 'brel ba'o //
translated: Meaningful means beneficial for livelihood and connected with each other.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni nad pa'o //
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni nad pa'o //
translated: To him refers to the sick person.

original: chos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni bsod nams la phan pa dang 'brel pa'o //
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni bsod nams la phan pa dang 'brel pa'o //
translated: In accord with the Dharma means connected with what is beneficial for merit.

original: lhag par chags pa'i dngos po 'gugs na dgag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la lhag par chags pa'i dngos po ni lhung bzed la sogs pa gang la nad pa'i srid pa'o //
analyzed: lhag par chags pa'i dngos po 'gugs na dgag par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la lhag par chags pa'i dngos po ni lhung bzed la sogs pa gang la nad pa'i srid pa'o //
translated: A thing to which he is attached is a bowl, etc.

original: 'gugs na zhes bya ba ni nad pas @44b nad g-yog la'o //üîΩmi gdams par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni nad g-yog gis nad pa la'o //
analyzed: 'gugs na zhes bya ba ni nad pas @44b nad g-yog la'o // mi gdams par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni nad g-yog gis nad pa la'o //
translated: Summoning is by a patient to an attendant.üîΩHe should not be ordered is by an attendant to a patient.

original: de nad pas bzla bar shin tu mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni nad g-yog gis gdams ngag byas pa las nad pa 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nad pas bzla bar shin tu mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni nad g-yog gis gdams ngag byas pa las nad pa 'da' bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: He should not be made to turn back is by an attendant who has given advice. The meaning is that a patient should not transgress the advice.

original: nad g-yog des de 'chi bar dogs na de dge 'dun gyi mal stan la bslang ste gang zag gi la gzhag par bya'o //üîΩbsku mnye dang khrus sngar bya ba nyid kyis sgyu thabs kyis so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: nad g-yog des de 'chi bar dogs na de dge 'dun gyi mal stan la bslang ste gang zag gi la gzhag par bya'o // bsku mnye dang khrus sngar bya ba nyid kyis sgyu thabs kyis so zhes bya ba la /
translated: If that attendant fears that he will die, he should lift him up from the Sa·πÖgha‚Äôs bed and place him on a bed belonging to an individual.üîΩBy the expedient of first giving him massage and a bath.

original: bsku mnye dang khrus sngar bya ba nyid kyis sgyu thabs kyis gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: bsku mnye dang khrus sngar bya ba nyid kyis sgyu thabs kyis gzhag par bya'o //
translated: He should be placed by the expedient of first giving him massage and a bath.

original: 'dir sgyu thabs ni gtso bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis po 'di dper rig par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir sgyu thabs ni gtso bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis po 'di dper rig par bya'o //
translated: Here, these two are to be understood as examples, because of the preeminence of the method of deception.

original: de'i gnas skabs kyi yongs su brtag pa la 'bad pa dang ldan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni shi ba'i gnas skabs yongs su gcod pa la lus kyi gnas skabs gang la 'chi ba'i dogs pa 'byung ba de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs kyi yongs su brtag pa la 'bad pa dang ldan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni shi ba'i gnas skabs yongs su gcod pa la lus kyi gnas skabs gang la 'chi ba'i dogs pa 'byung ba de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should be diligent in the investigation of that situation. This means that in the situation of death, in whatever situation of the body the fear of death arises, that is the meaning of ‚Äúin that.‚Äù

original: 'dir 'bad pa ni yang nas yang du rtog pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'bad pa ni yang nas yang du rtog pa'o //
translated: Here, diligence is repeated investigation.

original: des sme bar byas pa'i shi ba'i gos de dag bkru ba ni des bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni nad des kun nas nyon mongs par byas pa shi ba'i gos de rnams la nad pa gang la nad g-yog des shi ba de nyid kyi gal
analyzed: des sme bar byas pa'i shi ba'i gos de dag bkru ba ni des bya ba nyid yin no zhes bya ba ni nad des kun nas nyon mongs par byas pa shi ba'i gos de rnams la nad pa gang la nad g-yog des shi ba de nyid kyi gal
translated: That is the very thing to be done with regard to those garments of the dead defiled by that, that is, the garments of the dead defiled by that disease. The meaning is that the attendant of the sick person who has died from that disease should wash those garments.

original: te gos de rnams yin na yang gzhan gyis de rnams bkru bar ma yin te /
analyzed: te gos de rnams yin na yang gzhan gyis de rnams bkru bar ma yin te /
translated: Even if they are the garments of that person, they are not to be washed by another.

original: nad g-yog des bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: nad g-yog des bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is to be done by that attendant.

original: dge 'dun 'dus pa na de'i gnas brtan mdun du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dge 'dun 'dus pa na de'i gnas brtan mdun du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: When the Sa·πÖgha is assembled, the most senior monk should go in front.

original: 'di ni rten dang brten pa'i rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dbang du bya ba la nye bar dgod pa ste dge 'dun tshogs pa na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan thog mar 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya
analyzed: 'di ni rten dang brten pa'i rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i mthar thug pa 'di la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis dbang du bya ba la nye bar dgod pa ste dge 'dun tshogs pa na dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan thog mar 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya
translated: This is the final division called the division of the basis and the based. Here, the most senior monk of the Sa·πÖgha is placed in control. When the Sa·πÖgha is assembled, the most senior monk of the Sa·πÖgha should go first.

original: ba'i don to //
analyzed: ba'i don to //
translated: This is the meaning.

original: 'gro ba'i tshe thogs na bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas brtan de'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i tshe thogs na bsdad par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas brtan de'o //
translated: When going, he should stop if obstructed. This refers to the most senior monk.

original: de rnams kyis de yang ngo zhes bya ba ni gang rnams kyi gnas brtan de de rnams kyis yang thogs na bsdad par bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis de yang ngo zhes bya ba ni gang rnams kyi gnas brtan de de rnams kyis yang thogs na bsdad par bya'o //
translated: They should also stop if obstructed. This refers to those whose most senior monk is he.

original: ma byung ba la ni ring bar song ste'o //
analyzed: ma byung ba la ni ring bar song ste'o //
translated: If it does not happen, he should go far away.

original: grong gi nyen kor du yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: grong gi nyen kor du yang ngo zhes bya ba la /
translated: Also in the vicinity of the village.

original: nyen kor gyi skra ni nye bar brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nyen kor gyi skra ni nye bar brjod par bya'o //
translated: The vicinity should be expressed as near.

original: gal te 'jug pa na phyi bzhin 'ongs pa na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni gal te mngon par 'jug par 'dod na phyi bzhin 'ong ba 'di la grong gi nyen kor du bsdad par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te 'jug pa na phyi bzhin 'ongs pa na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni gal te mngon par 'jug par 'dod na phyi bzhin 'ong ba 'di la grong gi nyen kor du bsdad par bya'o //
translated: If he is about to enter, and if he comes after him, he should say, ‚ÄúIf you wish to enter, wait for this one who is coming after you at the outskirts of the village.‚Äù

original: de ltar lta bar gyur pa rnams la gal te sbron pa 'ongs na yang de la gnas brtan 'ongs kyi bar du sdod cig @45a * //üîΩces go bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de ltar lta bar gyur pa rnams la gal te sbron pa 'ongs na yang de la gnas brtan 'ongs kyi bar du sdod cig @45a * // ces go bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: If the messengers of those who have such views come, he should make them understand, ‚ÄúWait until the elder arrives.‚Äù

original: de la zhes bya ba sbron pa la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba sbron pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the messengers.

original: zas kyi phyir son pa nyid na lag chu drangs pa'i tshe gal te dus yod na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni zas kyi phyir ram btung ba'i phyir son pa nyid na lag chu drangs pa'i tshe gal te thogs par gyur pa rnams la dus yod na de
analyzed: zas kyi phyir son pa nyid na lag chu drangs pa'i tshe gal te dus yod na yang ngo zhes bya ba ni zas kyi phyir ram btung ba'i phyir son pa nyid na lag chu drangs pa'i tshe gal te thogs par gyur pa rnams la dus yod na de
translated: If he has gone for food, and if he has time when the water for washing is brought, he should say, ‚ÄúIf those who are delayed have time, let them come to the place where the water for washing is.‚Äù

original: nas sbron pa de la tshur shog ji srid dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan 'ongs kyi bar du sdod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
analyzed: nas sbron pa de la tshur shog ji srid dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan 'ongs kyi bar du sdod cig ces bsgo bar bya'o //
translated: Then he should tell the messengers, ‚ÄúCome here. Wait until the elder of the Sa·πÖgha arrives.‚Äù

original: med na gral der de'i stan gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsdad pa'i dus su med na bza' ba la sogs par zhugs pa la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan la stan bzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: med na gral der de'i stan gzhag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsdad pa'i dus su med na bza' ba la sogs par zhugs pa la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan la stan bzhag par bya'o //
translated: This means that if it is not present at the time of sitting, then a seat should be placed for the elder of the Sa·πÖgha when he enters to eat, etc.

original: 'dug pa dang phyi rol du yang so sor brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'dug pa dang phyi rol du yang so sor brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should also examine individually while sitting and outside.

original: 'dir 'dug pa ni khyim gyi nang du'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'dug pa ni khyim gyi nang du'o //
translated: Here, sitting means inside the house.

original: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni sdod sa las so //
analyzed: phyi rol zhes bya ba ni sdod sa las so //
translated: Outside means outside the dwelling place.

original: gnas skabs 'di dag la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor brtag par bya'o //üîΩlegs par ma bgos pa nyid dang legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid yin na mdzes par bya ba'i phyir de gnyis la brda bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gnas skabs 'di dag la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so sor brtag par bya'o // legs par ma bgos pa nyid dang legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid yin na mdzes par bya ba'i phyir de gnyis la brda bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The elder of the Sa·πÖgha should examine these situations.üîΩIf it is not well-spread or not well-hung, then a sign should be made for those two in order to beautify it.

original: legs par ma bgos pa nyid dam legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid la mdzes par bya ba'i phyir 'di dag gi rgyu mtshan du 'di la bya'o //
analyzed: legs par ma bgos pa nyid dam legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid la mdzes par bya ba'i phyir 'di dag gi rgyu mtshan du 'di la bya'o //
translated: The sign for that should be made in order to beautify it if it is not well-spread or not well-hung.

original: de gnyis la zhes bya ba ni ma bgos pa nyid dam legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid la'o //üîΩma go na drung na mo zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di ma bgos pa nyid dam legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid do //
analyzed: de gnyis la zhes bya ba ni ma bgos pa nyid dam legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid la'o // ma go na drung na mo zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di ma bgos pa nyid dam legs par ma dpyangs pa nyid do //
translated: The two means either not divided or not well hung.

original: ma go na drung na mo byed du gzhug go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ma go na drung na mo byed du gzhug go zhes bya ba la /
translated: If not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If this is not understood, the elder of the Sa·πÖgha should make a sign, and if that is not understood, then that one should make a sign.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.

original: gal te 'di ma bgos pa nyid dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis brda byed bzhin pas go bar ma gyur na de nas drung na mo des byed du gzhug go //üîΩma gyur na rang gis so zhes bya ba ni de ltar na yang mdzes par byed pa la /üîΩgrub par ma gyur na rang gis byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: gal te 'di ma bgos pa nyid dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis brda byed bzhin pas go bar ma gyur na de nas drung na mo des byed du gzhug go // ma gyur na rang gis so zhes bya ba ni de ltar na yang mdzes par byed pa la / grub par ma gyur na rang gis byed du gzhug go //
translated: If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.üîΩ If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.

original: brnga ma go na tshig gis byed du gzhug go //
analyzed: brnga ma go na tshig gis byed du gzhug go //
translated: If that is not understood, one should make a sign with one's hand.

original: gsar bu de dag la kun du smra bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: gsar bu de dag la kun du smra bar mi bya'o //
translated: If that is

original: gang rnams kyis der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa der de dag gi tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims de 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing nges par sbyar bar yang ba'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gang rnams kyis der dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan des gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa der de dag gi tshul khrims kyi tshul khrims de 'dzin du gzhug par bya zhing nges par sbyar bar yang ba'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The elder of the sa·πÖgha there should cause those who are new to uphold that morality of the monastery and the morality of the forest, and should certainly apply himself to that.

original: gang rnams kyi zhes bya ni gsar bu de rnams la'o //
analyzed: gang rnams kyi zhes bya ni gsar bu de rnams la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThose who‚Äù refers to those who are new.

original: de dag gi tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang gi tshul khrims dang dgon pa'i tshul khrims so //üîΩnges par sbyar bar bya zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de dag gi tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni gtsug lag khang gi tshul khrims dang dgon pa'i tshul khrims so // nges par sbyar bar bya zhes pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúThat morality‚Äù is the morality of the monastery and the morality of the forest.

original: de dag gi tshul @45b khrims 'dzin du gzhug par bya ba gcig pur ma zad kyi /
analyzed: de dag gi tshul @45b khrims 'dzin du gzhug par bya ba gcig pur ma zad kyi /
translated: ‚ÄúShould cause them to uphold‚Äù means that not only should they be caused to uphold that morality,

original: 'on kyang tshul khrims de bsgrub pa la de rnams kyi nges par sbyar ba yang bya'o //
analyzed: 'on kyang tshul khrims de bsgrub pa la de rnams kyi nges par sbyar ba yang bya'o //
translated: but also they should be certainly applied to the practice of that morality.

original: glo bur du 'ongs pas ni so sor brtags nas gnas mal gyi phyi rol gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: glo bur du 'ongs pas ni so sor brtags nas gnas mal gyi phyi rol gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: A visitor should examine and inform the permanent residents outside the sleeping quarters.

original: gnas mal gyi phyir glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis glo bur du 'ongs pa ma yin pa rnams la so sor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gnas mal gyi phyir glo bur du 'ongs pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis glo bur du 'ongs pa ma yin pa rnams la so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: The elder of the resident monks should examine the resident monks for the sake of the bedding.

original: gang rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan 'di gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la gnas mal gyi phyir brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gang rnams kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan 'di gnyug mar gnas pa rnams la gnas mal gyi phyir brjod par bya'o //
translated: The elder of the resident monks should announce to the resident monks for the sake of the bedding.

original: 'gro bar chas pas ni phyogs dang 'gron pa dang gnas dang gnas mal gyi grogs na ni mi 'dor ba nyid brtags nas 'bag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'gro bar chas pas ni phyogs dang 'gron pa dang gnas dang gnas mal gyi grogs na ni mi 'dor ba nyid brtags nas 'bag par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One who is about to depart should not abandon the bedding, having examined the companions in the region, the guests, the place, and the bedding.

original: 'gro bar chas pa la ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan no //
analyzed: 'gro bar chas pa la ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan no //
translated: The elder of the resident monks is for one who is about to depart.

original: 'gron pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni don gyis go bar bya ste phyogs gang du 'gro bar bya ba 'gro ba dang lam gyis gnas gang zhig der 'gro ba la gnas mal dang de thams cad blo rigs pa nyid kyis gzhal bar bya ste grogs rnams dang
analyzed: 'gron pa rnams la zhes bya ba ni don gyis go bar bya ste phyogs gang du 'gro bar bya ba 'gro ba dang lam gyis gnas gang zhig der 'gro ba la gnas mal dang de thams cad blo rigs pa nyid kyis gzhal bar bya ste grogs rnams dang
translated: The guests are to be understood by the meaning. In whatever region one is going, on the road, and in whatever place one is going, the bedding and all that should be examined by the proper mind, together with the companions.

original: nad yod pa la gang gis kyang su yang yongs su dor bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de ltar gzhal bar byas nas de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: nad yod pa la gang gis kyang su yang yongs su dor bar mi bya'o zhes bya ba de ltar gzhal bar byas nas de nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas thob par bya ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: Having thus determined, ‚ÄúNo one should be abandoned by anyone, because of the existence of sickness,‚Äù one should go forth in order to attain the state of one‚Äôs choice.

original: ring por ma son par thams cad kyi tha mar la la'i cung zad ma lus sam zhes 'phral du dran par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyid do //
analyzed: ring por ma son par thams cad kyi tha mar la la'i cung zad ma lus sam zhes 'phral du dran par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyid do //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving gone forth, one should immediately remember, ‚ÄòHave I left nothing behind?‚Äô‚Äù This is the seniority of the sa·πÖgha.

original: gsar bu rnams mi rgod pa nyid dang ma khengs pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gsar bu rnams mi rgod pa nyid dang ma khengs pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: ‚ÄúThe young should be established in non-violence and non-arrogance.‚Äù

original: rgod pa ni nye bar ma zhi ba'o //
analyzed: rgod pa ni nye bar ma zhi ba'o //
translated: Violence is non-pacification.

original: khengs pa nyid ni rengs pa nyid de de dag bzlog pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: khengs pa nyid ni rengs pa nyid de de dag bzlog pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Arrogance is stiffness. One should establish them in the avoidance of those. This is the meaning.

original: khyim phyir nye ba ni thams cad kyis thams cad kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni mi rgod pa nyid dang ma khengs pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang rjes su 'brel lo //üîΩ'gro bar chas pa ni gnas brten nyid ma yin te /üîΩ'on kyang gzhan yang ste gsar du zhugs pa nyid rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khyim phyir nye ba ni thams cad kyis thams cad kyang ngo zhes bya ba ni mi rgod pa nyid dang ma khengs pa nyid la dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba dang rjes su 'brel lo // 'gro bar chas pa ni gnas brten nyid ma yin te / 'on kyang gzhan yang ste gsar du zhugs pa nyid rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: The phrase those who are about to depart means those who are not the most senior members of the Sa·πÖgha.üîΩHowever, it also means those who are not the most junior members of the Sa·πÖgha.

original: 'on kyang gzhan la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan la yang zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The phrase those who are not the most junior members of the Sa·πÖgha means those who are not the most junior members of the Sa·πÖgha.

original: kun shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar chas pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan no //
analyzed: kun shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'gro bar chas pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan no //
translated: The phrase those who are about to depart means the most senior members of the Sa·πÖgha who are about to depart.

original: dge 'dun ni spyod pa dang spyod lam brtan pa dang lung nod pa la sogs pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa dang nad pa la bgo bsha' bya ba la sogs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pas phan gdags @46a * //üîΩpar bya'o zhes bya ba la spyod pa ni yul lo //
analyzed: dge 'dun ni spyod pa dang spyod lam brtan pa dang lung nod pa la sogs pa dang zas kyi rnyed pa dang nad pa la bgo bsha' bya ba la sogs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pas phan gdags @46a * // par bya'o zhes bya ba la spyod pa ni yul lo //
translated: The Sa·πÖgha should be benefited by the performance of activities such as reciting the scriptures, etc., and by the distribution of food to those who are sick. The phrase by the performance of activities means by the performance of activities such as reciting the scriptures, etc.

original: spyod lam ni spyod lam mo //üîΩde dag bstan pa ni 'di ni yul lo //
analyzed: spyod lam ni spyod lam mo //üîΩde dag bstan pa ni 'di ni yul lo //
translated: The phrase by the distribution of food to those who are sick means by the distribution of food to those who are sick.üîΩThe phrase by the performance of activities means by the performance of activities such as reciting the scriptures, etc.üîΩThe phrase by the distribution of food to those who are sick means by the distribution of food to those who are sick.

original: 'di ni yul ma yin pa de ltar 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yul ma yin pa de ltar 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: This is the object, This is not the object, This is how you should go, and so on.

original: lung nod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba 'di la kha ton la sogs pa rnams ni sogs kyi sgras gzung ngo //
analyzed: lung nod pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba 'di la kha ton la sogs pa rnams ni sogs kyi sgras gzung ngo //
translated: Recitation, and so on, here the recitation, and so on, is included by the word and so on.

original: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas gtsug lag khang gi byi dor mi byed pa la gros btab ste byi dor byed du gzhug cing byi dor byed pa la ni spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pas gtsug lag khang gi byi dor mi byed pa la gros btab ste byi dor byed du gzhug cing byi dor byed pa la ni spro bar bya'o //
translated: By accepting the rainy season retreat, one should not clean the monastery, but should encourage others to do it and be enthusiastic about it.

original: thams cad kyi 'khor du gtogs pa gtam 'dod pa dag la rjes su mthun pa'i chos nye bar bsgrub pas phan gdags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te des 'khor du gtogs pa rnams gtam 'dod na de nas gang zhig gang la rjes su mthun pa'i chos
analyzed: thams cad kyi 'khor du gtogs pa gtam 'dod pa dag la rjes su mthun pa'i chos nye bar bsgrub pas phan gdags par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gal te des 'khor du gtogs pa rnams gtam 'dod na de nas gang zhig gang la rjes su mthun pa'i chos
translated: One should benefit those in one's retinue who desire conversation by providing them with Dharma in accordance with their wishes. This means that if those in one's retinue desire conversation, then one should provide them with Dharma in accordance with their wishes and what is suitable for them.

original: nye bar bsdus pas des rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar bsdus pas des rjes su gzung bar bya'o //
translated: One should support them with that.

original: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so //
analyzed: thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so //
translated: All means the elder of the Sa·πÖgha.

original: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: dbyar gnas par khas blangs pa'i dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: But not the elder of the community who has undertaken the rainy season retreat.

original: mi smra ba nyid la dga' ba dag btang snyoms su gzhag ste /
analyzed: mi smra ba nyid la dga' ba dag btang snyoms su gzhag ste /
translated: Those who delight in silence should remain indifferent.

original: smra ba'i dngos po ni smra ba nyid 'dir mi smra ba'i dngos po 'phags pa zhes bya ba mngon par 'dod pa ste mi smra ba tsam ni ma yin no //
analyzed: smra ba'i dngos po ni smra ba nyid 'dir mi smra ba'i dngos po 'phags pa zhes bya ba mngon par 'dod pa ste mi smra ba tsam ni ma yin no //
translated: The state of speech is the state of speech itself, which is called the noble silence, not mere silence.

original: khyim pa nye bar 'ongs pa'i 'tshal ma sbyor du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams la kha zas sbyin par rigs pa zhes bya ba'o //üîΩdge slong rnams la go bar byas nas gal te dge slong de rnams la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis brjod cing go bar mi byed pa'am khyim pa de rnams zar mi 'dod na de'i tshe mi byed dam mi 'dod na de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i
analyzed: khyim pa nye bar 'ongs pa'i 'tshal ma sbyor du gzhug go zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams la kha zas sbyin par rigs pa zhes bya ba'o // dge slong rnams la go bar byas nas gal te dge slong de rnams la dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis brjod cing go bar mi byed pa'am khyim pa de rnams zar mi 'dod na de'i tshe mi byed dam mi 'dod na de dag la chos dang ldan pa'i
translated: When laypeople come, they should be made to prepare the food. This means it is appropriate to give food to them.

original: gtam byas nas bdag cag la 'di yod do zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtam byas nas bdag cag la 'di yod do zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: If the elder of the community does not speak or make himself understood to those monks, or if those laypeople do not wish to eat, then at that time, if they do not act or do not wish, having spoken a Dharma-consistent talk to them, it should be said to them, We have this.

original: de dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'khor la so sor brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang ldan pa thams cad ma yin te /
analyzed: de dang ldan pa thams cad kyis 'khor la so sor brtag par bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang ldan pa thams cad ma yin te /
translated: All who possess that should examine the assembly. This is not all who possess an assembly.

original: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyid ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan nyid ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not just the elder of the Sa·πÖgha.

original: don med par spyod pa tshar gcad do zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang ldan pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba dang rjes su 'brel lo //
analyzed: don med par spyod pa tshar gcad do zhes bya ba ni 'khor dang ldan pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba dang rjes su 'brel lo //
translated: One should restrain those who act without purpose. This is connected with ‚Äúall who possess an assembly.‚Äù

original: ji ltar don med pas dus 'da' bar mi byed pa dang rab tu byung ba dang rab tu byung ba don med par yang mi byed pa de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩde la 'gro ba la sogs pa la de ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas @46b par bgyi /
analyzed: ji ltar don med pas dus 'da' bar mi byed pa dang rab tu byung ba dang rab tu byung ba don med par yang mi byed pa de ltar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to // de la 'gro ba la sogs pa la de ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gnas @46b par bgyi /
translated: The meaning is that one should act so as not to waste time without purpose and so as not to make the going forth without purpose.

original: ji ltar 'gro bar bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang dag par zhugs pa la ltos pa'i sogs kyi sgra'o //
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro bar bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni yang dag par zhugs pa la ltos pa'i sogs kyi sgra'o //
translated: There, one should act just as one is going, etc. The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù refers to ‚ÄúHow should one stay?‚Äù ‚ÄúHow should one go?‚Äù and so on, which are dependent on the one who has correctly entered.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni 'khor la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni 'khor la'o //
translated: There means in the assembly.

original: de ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 'khor ji lta bas de 'khor dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de ji lta ba bzhin du zhes bya ba ni 'khor ji lta bas de 'khor dang rjes su mthun pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Just as they are means that the retinue is in accordance with the retinue.

original: gtam sna tshogs dang 'gal ba med par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de la zhes bya ba dang sbyar te chos 'dul ba dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: gtam sna tshogs dang 'gal ba med par bya'o zhes bya ba ni de la zhes bya ba dang sbyar te chos 'dul ba dang 'gal lo //
translated: One should not contradict various conversations means that one should not contradict the Dharma and Vinaya.

original: 'gal ba med par bya ba ni 'gal ba med pa ste /
analyzed: 'gal ba med par bya ba ni 'gal ba med pa ste /
translated: Not contradicting means not contradicting.

original: gtam sna tshogs pa dang 'dres pa'o //
analyzed: gtam sna tshogs pa dang 'dres pa'o //
translated: It is mixed with various conversations.

original: phyi bzhin 'brang ba dge sbyong mdun du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: phyi bzhin 'brang ba dge sbyong mdun du 'gro bar mi bya'o //
translated: A ≈õrama·πáa should not go in front of a follower.

original: 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bya ni sngon du 'am phyi nas dge sbyong gis 'dug par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to /
analyzed: 'dug par mi bya'o zhes bya ni sngon du 'am phyi nas dge sbyong gis 'dug par mi bya zhes bya ba'i don to /
translated: The meaning of should not sit is that a ≈õrama·πáa should not sit either before or after.

original: smra nas smra bar bya zhing zhes bya ba ni mi smra bar cung zad brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: smra nas smra bar bya zhing zhes bya ba ni mi smra bar cung zad brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Having spoken, one should speak means that one should not speak a little without speaking.

original: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di la mdun du dge sbyong gis smra ba de bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang zhig 'di la mdun du dge sbyong gis smra ba de bsgrub par bya zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should accomplish means that one should accomplish whatever a ≈õrama·πáa speaks in front of this.

original: gtam gyi bar chad mi bya'o zhes bya ba ne dge sbyong bla ma gtam byed pas na bar du gtam mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gtam gyi bar chad mi bya'o zhes bya ba ne dge sbyong bla ma gtam byed pas na bar du gtam mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: One should not interrupt the conversation means that since the elder monk is speaking, one should not interrupt his conversation.

original: chos ma yin pa smra ba zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong bla ma ste bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: chos ma yin pa smra ba zhes bya ba ni dge sbyong bla ma ste bzlog par bya'o //
translated: One should not speak contrary to the Dharma means that one should not speak contrary to the elder monk, who is a spiritual practitioner.

original: chos kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
analyzed: chos kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
translated: One should rejoice in the Dharma.

original: chos dang ldan pa'i rnyed pa byung na blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ngo ;
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rnyed pa byung na blang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong ngo ;
translated: If one obtains goods in accordance with the Dharma, one should accept them refers to a monk who follows behind.

original: / de ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul khrims yin no //
analyzed: / de ni phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul khrims yin no //
translated: This is the morality of a monk who follows behind.

original: khyim du 'gro ba'i tshul khrims brjod par bya ste /üîΩkhyim du mi rgod pa dang ma khengs pa dang mi gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba la mi rgod pa dang zhes bya ba ni thams cad khyim du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: khyim du 'gro ba'i tshul khrims brjod par bya ste / khyim du mi rgod pa dang ma khengs pa dang mi gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba la mi rgod pa dang zhes bya ba ni thams cad khyim du 'gyur ro //
translated: The morality of going to a house should be explained.üîΩOne should not be restless, puffed up, or stay in a house. Not being restless means not being restless in any house.

original: ma khengs pa dang mi gnas par bya ba la khyim nas 'gro bar 'dod pa nyid ni mi gnas pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma khengs pa dang mi gnas par bya ba la khyim nas 'gro bar 'dod pa nyid ni mi gnas pa nyid do //
translated: Not being puffed up means not being puffed up in any house. Not staying means not wanting to leave a house.

original: mig dmad pa dang khyim pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mig dmad pa dang khyim pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should reprove the eyes and have a conversation about the Dharma with householders.

original: mig dmad pa zhes bya ba ni yul rnams las te /
analyzed: mig dmad pa zhes bya ba ni yul rnams las te /
translated: Here, reprove the eyes means in regard to objects.

original: mig so sor dmad par byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mig so sor dmad par byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is: one should reprove the eyes individually.

original: khyim pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
analyzed: khyim pa rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
translated: One should have a conversation about the Dharma with householders.

original: sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa dang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang gso sbyong dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi gzung ba dag la de rnams nges par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sbyin pa dang dul ba dang yang dag par sdom pa dang tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang gso sbyong dang skyabs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi gzung ba dag la de rnams nges par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should definitely engage them in giving, self-control, restraint, abiding in celibacy, purification, going for refuge, and taking up the precepts.

original: de rnams zhes bya ba ni khyim pa rnams so //üîΩdul ba ni @47a * //
analyzed: de rnams zhes bya ba ni khyim pa rnams so // dul ba ni @47a * //
translated: Here, them refers to householders.üîΩSelf-control is

original: dbang du byed pa ste /
analyzed: dbang du byed pa ste /
translated: subduing.

original: dbang po rnams dang lus dang ngag dag la dbang du byed pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po rnams dang lus dang ngag dag la dbang du byed pa nyid do //
translated: It is the very act of subduing the faculties, body, and speech.

original: yang dag par sdom pa ni 'di rnams la 'gro ba med pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par sdom pa ni 'di rnams la 'gro ba med pa ste /
translated: Restraint is the absence of going for them,

original: 'dul ba dang 'dul ba nyid la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul ba dang 'dul ba nyid la gnas pa'o //
translated: abiding in discipline and being disciplined.

original: tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni rab tu byung ba'i tshul khrims dang khyim pa nyid la yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grong ba'i chos las phyir bzlog par bya'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni rab tu byung ba'i tshul khrims dang khyim pa nyid la yang ji srid 'tsho'i bar du grong ba'i chos las phyir bzlog par bya'o //
translated: The phrase abiding in pure conduct refers to the morality of one who has gone forth into the homeless state. However, even a householder should turn away from the conduct of a householder for as long as he or she lives.

original: ltung ba'i sgor gyur ba'i 'jug pa thams cad la dran pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ltung ba'i sgor gyur ba'i 'jug pa thams cad la dran pas bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: One should practice mindfulness with regard to all the occasions that are doors to the downfalls.

original: dran pas zhes bya ba ni ltung ba rnams la zhes bya ba'i don gyis go bas khyim du 'jug pa la sogs pa 'gro ba la sogs pa 'jug pa ltung ba las 'da' ba'i sgor gyur pa gang yin pa de la de ltar dran pa nye bar gnas
analyzed: dran pas zhes bya ba ni ltung ba rnams la zhes bya ba'i don gyis go bas khyim du 'jug pa la sogs pa 'gro ba la sogs pa 'jug pa ltung ba las 'da' ba'i sgor gyur pa gang yin pa de la de ltar dran pa nye bar gnas
translated: The phrase one should practice mindfulness is understood to mean with regard to the downfalls. Therefore, one should establish mindfulness in this way with regard to all the occasions that are doors to the downfalls, such as entering a house, and so on, and going, and so on, so that one does not incur even the slightest downfall.

original: par byas nas ji ltar cung zad ltung bar mi 'gyur ro //üîΩrjes su 'gro ba bslabs pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang rjes su 'brel to //
analyzed: par byas nas ji ltar cung zad ltung bar mi 'gyur ro // rjes su 'gro ba bslabs pas mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba dang rjes su 'brel to //
translated: One should not do anything that is contrary to the training.

original: 'di ni rjes su bstan pa dang rjes su 'brel ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni rjes su bstan pa dang rjes su 'brel ba ma yin te /
translated: This is not a statement that is connected with the preceding phrase, One should practice mindfulness with regard to all the occasions that are doors to the downfalls.

original: de bas na bsgrub par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na bsgrub par mi bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one should not do it.

original: 'di'i rjes su bstan pa 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩ'ongs pa la 'ongs pa legs so zhes sngar snyan pa brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'di'i rjes su bstan pa 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to // 'ongs pa la 'ongs pa legs so zhes sngar snyan pa brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: The meaning is that one should not transgress the instruction.üîΩOne should first speak pleasantly to one who has come, saying, ‚ÄúWelcome!‚Äù

original: 'ongs pa la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba ni legs par 'ongs pa smra ba las bsnyen par brjod par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'ongs pa la 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba ni legs par 'ongs pa smra ba las bsnyen par brjod par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúWelcome!‚Äù means that one should speak respectfully to one who has come.

original: 'ongs pa la zhes bya ba ni rab tu byung ba'am khyim pa la'o //
analyzed: 'ongs pa la zhes bya ba ni rab tu byung ba'am khyim pa la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne who has come‚Äù means one who has gone forth or a layperson.

original: bzhin gyi mdangs gsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ngom zum mi bya'o //
analyzed: bzhin gyi mdangs gsal bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni ngom zum mi bya'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOne should have a clear face‚Äù means one should not frown.

original: 'dzum pa sngar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dzum pa thog mar 'gro ba ste ;
analyzed: 'dzum pa sngar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'dzum pa thog mar 'gro ba ste ;
translated: ‚ÄúOne should smile first‚Äù means one should go first with a smile.

original: mngon du phyogs pa ster ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: mngon du phyogs pa ster ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that one should give a friendly reception.

original: bar dang bcas pa'i 'jug pa yang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: bar dang bcas pa'i 'jug pa yang 'dzum pa dang bcas pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If one does not smile, one‚Äôs speech will be accompanied by frowns.

original: de'i phyir khro gnyer med par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir khro gnyer med par bya'o zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore, it is said, ‚ÄúOne should be free from frowns.‚Äù

original: gal te khyim pa zhig yin na de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
analyzed: gal te khyim pa zhig yin na de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam bya'o //
translated: If he is a layperson, he should be given a Dharma talk.

original: grong mtha' bas ni der mi 'ong na kun dga' bar 'gyur ba ci nus pas lhug par bya'o //
analyzed: grong mtha' bas ni der mi 'ong na kun dga' bar 'gyur ba ci nus pas lhug par bya'o //
translated: If he is not coming to the monastery, he should be given whatever he needs to be happy.

original: mi 'ong na zhes bya ba la mi 'ong na ni khyim pa'o //
analyzed: mi 'ong na zhes bya ba la mi 'ong na ni khyim pa'o //
translated: If he is not coming: if he is a layperson.

original: grong mtha' bas ni dge slong ngo //
analyzed: grong mtha' bas ni dge slong ngo //
translated: From the monastery: from the monastery.

original: kun dga' bar 'gyur ba ni bza' ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: kun dga' bar 'gyur ba ni bza' ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Whatever he needs to be happy: food, etc.

original: ci nus pas lhug par bya'o //
analyzed: ci nus pas lhug par bya'o //
translated: He should be given whatever he needs to be happy.

original: chu dang stan bstabs par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: chu dang stan bstabs par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: He should be given water and a seat.

original: dgon @47b pa bas kyang chu dang stan dang zhes bya bar bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: dgon @47b pa bas kyang chu dang stan dang zhes bya bar bsdu ba'o //
translated: The monk in the wilderness should also give water and a seat.üîΩThe novice should set out the broom, bed, seat, water, and food, and serve the food.

original: phyag dar dang mal dang stan bsham pa dang chu gzhag pa dang brim pa dang zan drang ba ni gsar bus bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang de yang dag par 'ongs pa la 'di thams cad gsar du zhugs pa des bya'o //
analyzed: phyag dar dang mal dang stan bsham pa dang chu gzhag pa dang brim pa dang zan drang ba ni gsar bus bya'o zhes bya ba ni gang de yang dag par 'ongs pa la 'di thams cad gsar du zhugs pa des bya'o //
translated: This is all to be done by the novice who has newly entered the monastic life.

original: g-yog 'khor gyi bya ba mi mthun pa gal te rang dang gzhan la gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni ci bder gzhag go zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: g-yog 'khor gyi bya ba mi mthun pa gal te rang dang gzhan la gnod par mi 'gyur ba ni ci bder gzhag go zhes bya ba la /
translated: If the activity of the retinue is not in accord, but it will not harm oneself or others, then one should let it be as it is.

original: ci bder gzhag go zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms su gzhag par bya ba'o //
analyzed: ci bder gzhag go zhes bya ba ni btang snyoms su gzhag par bya ba'o //
translated: Let it be as it is means that one should be indifferent.

original: gal te khas blangs par gyur pa yin na rang dang gzhan rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te khas blangs par gyur pa yin na rang dang gzhan rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is what one has agreed to, then it will not harm oneself or others.

original: gal te de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te 'khor gyi bya ba de gnod pa'i phyir yin la nus pa yod na de rgyun bcad la zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i bya ba gzhan no //
analyzed: gal te de lta yin na zhes bya ba ni gal te 'khor gyi bya ba de gnod pa'i phyir yin la nus pa yod na de rgyun bcad la zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i bya ba gzhan no //
translated: If it is like that, then if the activity of the retinue is for the sake of harm and there is the ability, one should stop it.

original: chos dang ldan pa ni bya ba'o //
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa ni bya ba'o //
translated: The activity that is in accord with the Dharma is another.

original: bskyed nas de g-yog 'khor la gros gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: bskyed nas de g-yog 'khor la gros gdab par bya'o //
translated: Having generated it, one should consult with the retinue.

original: de'i gzhi las g-yog 'khor mi dga' zhing 'pho ba lta na phyir bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba skyed par 'gyur ba la g-yog 'khor de la gal te sems mi dga' zhing yid mi bde bar gyur tam /
analyzed: de'i gzhi las g-yog 'khor mi dga' zhing 'pho ba lta na phyir bsdu bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba skyed par 'gyur ba la g-yog 'khor de la gal te sems mi dga' zhing yid mi bde bar gyur tam /
translated: If, on the basis of that, the retinue is unhappy and wants to leave, then one should gather them back.

original: nad med pa'am gzhan gyis 'gro bar bya zhing de la so sor 'du byed pa'o //
analyzed: nad med pa'am gzhan gyis 'gro bar bya zhing de la so sor 'du byed pa'o //
translated: If the retinue is unhappy and discontent, or if they are sick, or if they want to go elsewhere, then one should individually apply oneself to them.

original: de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pas so sor bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pas so sor bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should individually gather them with generosity and so forth.

original: g-yog 'khor ji lta ba 'di la gnyis su yang mi 'gyur bar zhis bya ba'o //
analyzed: g-yog 'khor ji lta ba 'di la gnyis su yang mi 'gyur bar zhis bya ba'o //
translated: One should not be two-faced with regard to the retinue.

original: mi nus pa nyid yin na yang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de rgyun gcad par mi nus pa nyid la gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi nus pa nyid yin na yang gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni de rgyun gcad par mi nus pa nyid la gzhan du 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: If one is unable to do that, then one should go elsewhere.

original: de'i rkyen gyis rtsod cing smra bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rkyen gyis rtsod cing smra bar mi bya'o //
translated: One should not quarrel and argue on account of that.

original: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' bar gnod pa byed na ci nas kyang de nyid 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir 'dzin pa gtang ba de ltar bya'o //
analyzed: dge 'dun gyi kun dga' bar gnod pa byed na ci nas kyang de nyid 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir 'dzin pa gtang ba de ltar bya'o //
translated: If he has harmed the Sa·πÖgha, he should be made to confess that very [harm] in order to be accepted.

original: mi 'gro na bab col du su la yang mi brjod par gzhon nu dang mdza' bshes dang zhang blon dang zhabs 'bring dag la skad sbyar te /
analyzed: mi 'gro na bab col du su la yang mi brjod par gzhon nu dang mdza' bshes dang zhang blon dang zhabs 'bring dag la skad sbyar te /
translated: If he does not go, without rashly telling anyone, he should be made to confess to the young men, friends, uncles, ministers, and servants.

original: 'khor dag par 'dzin du bcug nas thul 'og tu gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'khor dag par 'dzin du bcug nas thul 'og tu gzhug par bya'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: Having made him confess to the pure assembly, he should be brought under control.

original: 'dzin du bcug nas zhes bya ba ni go bar byas nas so //
analyzed: 'dzin du bcug nas zhes bya ba ni go bar byas nas so //
translated: Having made him confess means having made him understand.

original: 'khor dag pa ni gang du 'di la chad pa mi dbab pa der 'jug par bya ba ni pham par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'khor dag pa ni gang du 'di la chad pa mi dbab pa der 'jug par bya ba ni pham par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The pure assembly is where he should be made to enter in order to not be punished. The meaning is he should be defeated.

original: gzhon nu la sogs pa rnams la gang zhig sngar go bar byed pa de ni 'di'i don du ste /üîΩpham par gyur pa de la brtan nas gcod par ma gyur @48a * //
analyzed: gzhon nu la sogs pa rnams la gang zhig sngar go bar byed pa de ni 'di'i don du ste / pham par gyur pa de la brtan nas gcod par ma gyur @48a * //
translated: Among the young men and so forth, whoever makes him understand first, for his sake,

original: cig ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: cig ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: May he not be cut off, relying on that defeated one. This is the meaning.

original: rab tu byung ba'i gzhi las /
analyzed: rab tu byung ba'i gzhi las /
translated: In the Chapter on Going Forth,

original: dge slong dang 'brel ba'i skabs bshad zin to /
analyzed: dge slong dang 'brel ba'i skabs bshad zin to /
translated: This has already been explained in the section on the monks.

original: // / da ni dge slong ma la brten pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: // / da ni dge slong ma la brten pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: Now, the basis of the nuns should be explained.

original: de la skyes pa rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa la brjod pa gang zhig de nyid bud med la yang zhes bya ba khas blang ngo //
analyzed: de la skyes pa rab tu 'byung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs pa la brjod pa gang zhig de nyid bud med la yang zhes bya ba khas blang ngo //
translated: In the statement, ‚ÄúWhatever is said about the going forth and the higher ordination of a man, the same should be accepted for a woman,‚Äù

original: bye brag tu ni 'di brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: bye brag tu ni 'di brjod par bya ste /
translated: the difference should be stated.

original: dge slong gi gnas su dge slong ma'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'am gcig por gyur pa'i mkhan po dang zhu ba po la sogs pa gang du dge slong smos pa der dge slong ma blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
analyzed: dge slong gi gnas su dge slong ma'o zhes bya ba ni dge 'dun gyi phyogs gcig tu gyur pa'am gcig por gyur pa'i mkhan po dang zhu ba po la sogs pa gang du dge slong smos pa der dge slong ma blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to
translated: The word ‚Äúnun‚Äù is substituted for ‚Äúmonk‚Äù in the place of a monk, meaning that in whatever is mentioned regarding the preceptor, the interviewer, and so on, in the case of a monk, the same should be understood for a nun.

original: // ci dge slong thams cad kyi gnas su yin nam 'on te 'ga' zhig la zhe na /
analyzed: // ci dge slong thams cad kyi gnas su yin nam 'on te 'ga' zhig la zhe na /
translated: Is this the case for all monks or for some?

original: de'i phyir rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rab tu byung ba thams cad kyi'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says, ‚ÄúIt is for all who have gone forth.‚Äù

original: rab tu byung ba'i yul la mkhan po la sogs pa'i dge slong thams cad kyi gnas su dge slong ma shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu byung ba'i yul la mkhan po la sogs pa'i dge slong thams cad kyi gnas su dge slong ma shes par bya'o //
translated: In the case of a woman who has gone forth, she should be known as the object of the preceptor and all the monks.

original: mkhan po nyid kyi don du zhu ba byed pa dang dge tshul ma'i sdom pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad dge slong ma rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: mkhan po nyid kyi don du zhu ba byed pa dang dge tshul ma'i sdom pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba 'di thams cad dge slong ma rnams kyis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: All of this‚Äîthe request for the sake of the preceptor, the bestowal of the novice nun‚Äôs vows‚Äîshould be done by the nuns.

original: 'dir dge slong la dbang du bya ba med do zhes bya ba 'di bstan pa'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'dir dge slong la dbang du bya ba med do zhes bya ba 'di bstan pa'i don du'o //
translated: This is taught in order to show that the monks have no authority in this case.üîΩIn the case of full ordination, it is other than the act of requesting, etc.,

original: bsnyen par rdzogs pa la ni de gsol pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa las gzhan pa'i'o zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa la dge slong thams cad kyi gnas su dge slong ma blta bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa la ni de gsol pa la sogs pa'i las byed pa las gzhan pa'i'o zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa la dge slong thams cad kyi gnas su dge slong ma blta bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: In the case of full ordination, the nuns are not to be seen as the object of all the monks.

original: 'on kyang bsnyen par rdzogs pa la ni de gsol ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa po las gzhan pa'i dge slong gi gnas su dge slong ma'i bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol ba nas brtsams te 'dir las byed pa po'i dge slong nyid de dge slong ma niüîΩma yin zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang bsnyen par rdzogs pa la ni de gsol ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa po las gzhan pa'i dge slong gi gnas su dge slong ma'i bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol ba nas brtsams te 'dir las byed pa po'i dge slong nyid de dge slong ma ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'gyur ro //
translated: From the beginning of the request for full ordination of a nun, it is said here that the monk who performs the rite is a monk, not a nun.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs pa gsol ba las snga rol du dge slong ma las byed pa po ste gang zhig 'dir dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'ga' zhig gi dbus su tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa gsol ba las snga rol du dge slong ma las byed pa po ste gang zhig 'dir dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'ga' zhig gi dbus su tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Before the request for full ordination, the nun is the one who performs the rite. The meaning is that in this case, in the midst of some assembly of nuns, she gives the vow of pure conduct.

original: 'dir dge 'dun gyis bsnan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol ba la sogs pa la dge slong gi dge 'dun slob dpon du gyur pa rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dge 'dun gyis bsnan par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs par gsol ba la sogs pa la dge slong gi dge 'dun slob dpon du gyur pa rtogs par bya'o //
translated: Here, the addition of the Sa·πÖgha is to be understood in the request for full ordination, etc., where the Sa·πÖgha of monks becomes the preceptor.

original: gnyis ka'i dge 'dun tshogs la gsol ba nas brtsams te las byed pa po ni @48b dang po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i dge 'dun tshogs la gsol ba nas brtsams te las byed pa po ni @48b dang po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the first is that the one who performs the rite, beginning with the request to the community of both, is the first.üîΩThe one who is without obstructions should be a nun.

original: bar chad dri ba dge slong ma bsgribs pa la bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad dri ba'i tshe dge 'dun gyi dbus su bar chad dri ba la lan gnyis bya dgos te /
analyzed: bar chad dri ba dge slong ma bsgribs pa la bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad dri ba'i tshe dge 'dun gyi dbus su bar chad dri ba la lan gnyis bya dgos te /
translated: When the obstructions are asked about, the one who is asked about the obstructions in the midst of the community must do it twice.

original: gcig ni tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i dus su dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'ba' zhig gi dbus su'o ;
analyzed: gcig ni tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa'i dus su dge slong ma'i dge 'dun 'ba' zhig gi dbus su'o ;
translated: One is in the midst of only the community of nuns at the time of giving the vow of the vow of pure activity.

original: / gzhan ni gnyis ka'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su'o //
analyzed: / gzhan ni gnyis ka'i dge 'dun gyi dbus su'o //
translated: The other is in the midst of the community of both.

original: de gnyis kar yang cho ga 'di bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de gnyis kar yang cho ga 'di bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
translated: In both of those, this rite should be understood.

original: ngo tsha ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'di brjod pa ste /
analyzed: ngo tsha ba'i rgyu mtshan du 'di brjod pa ste /
translated: This is stated as a reason for shame.

original: res bya ba dang res mi bya ba shes pa'i don du dang po bya ba'i tshig sbyar ro //
analyzed: res bya ba dang res mi bya ba shes pa'i don du dang po bya ba'i tshig sbyar ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúfirst‚Äù is used for the purpose of knowing what to do and what not to do.

original: bud med la ni dge slong ma zhes pa'i tshig gzhan yod do zhes bya ba ni dge tshul mas 'og tu dge slong ma nyid ces bya ba'i tshig gnyis pa 'di skyes pa dang thun mong ma yin no //
analyzed: bud med la ni dge slong ma zhes pa'i tshig gzhan yod do zhes bya ba ni dge tshul mas 'og tu dge slong ma nyid ces bya ba'i tshig gnyis pa 'di skyes pa dang thun mong ma yin no //
translated: The second term, bhiksuni, is not common to both men and women.

original: de'i tshig gsum pa 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshig gsum pa 'di yin te /
translated: This is the third term.üîΩAnd that is only for one who is abiding.

original: de yang gnas pa kho na la'o zhes bya ba ni dge tshul ma nyid dang dge slong ma nyid dag dang khyad par med pa nyid bstan pa'i don du kho na'i sgra'o //
analyzed: de yang gnas pa kho na la'o zhes bya ba ni dge tshul ma nyid dang dge slong ma nyid dag dang khyad par med pa nyid bstan pa'i don du kho na'i sgra'o //
translated: The word only is for the purpose of teaching that there is no difference between the terms sramanerika and bhiksuni.

original: ji ltar tshig gnyis po 'di dag brten pa la de bzhin du 'di yang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar tshig gnyis po 'di dag brten pa la de bzhin du 'di yang zhes bya'o //
translated: Just as these two terms are based on the two roots, so also this one.

original: de bas na mkhan po nyid kyis dge slong ma su zhig yin gyi de nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na mkhan po nyid kyis dge slong ma su zhig yin gyi de nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that any bhiksuni is a preceptor.

original: gang zhig dge tshul ma'i don du zhes bya ba rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhig dge tshul ma'i don du zhes bya ba rig par bya'o //
translated: But rather, it should be understood that she is a preceptor for whom the novice nun status is the object.

original: de ltar na mkhan po bud med dang lhan cig rnam pa gsum yin te ;
analyzed: de ltar na mkhan po bud med dang lhan cig rnam pa gsum yin te ;
translated: Thus, a preceptor is a woman in three ways.

original: skyes pa la ni rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: skyes pa la ni rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The term ‚Äútwo types‚Äù is used because there are two types of males.

original: dge slong ma nyid kyi tshig gzhan de gnas skabs gang du sbyin par bya zhing de'i dus ji srid du spyad par bya dgos she na /
analyzed: dge slong ma nyid kyi tshig gzhan de gnas skabs gang du sbyin par bya zhing de'i dus ji srid du spyad par bya dgos she na /
translated: In what state is the term ‚Äúfully ordained nun‚Äù given? For how long is it to be used?

original: de'i phyir dge slong ma nyid dang dge slob ma gnyis kyis bar skabs su spyod pa'i dus ni lo gnyis so zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dge slong ma nyid dang dge slob ma gnyis kyis bar skabs su spyod pa'i dus ni lo gnyis so zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, ‚ÄúThe period of time for fully ordained nuns and probationary nuns to practice is two years.‚Äù

original: dus de srid du spyad pa nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ltar dus yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: dus de srid du spyad pa nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ltar dus yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
translated: Because they practice for that period of time, they are called ‚Äúfully ordained.‚Äù In this way, they hold the period of time.

original: brtul zhugs te spyad par mi bya zhes bya ba 'di'i 'og tu ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brtul zhugs te spyad par mi bya zhes bya ba 'di'i 'og tu ni ma yin no //
translated: They should not practice the vows of a fully ordained nun.

original: de bas na dus 'di rdzogs pa nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sngon rol du bslab par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de bas na dus 'di rdzogs pa nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i sngon rol du bslab par mi bya ste /
translated: Therefore, because they have completed this period of time, they should not practice the training of a fully ordained nun before they are fully ordained.

original: spyod pa 'di nyams pa'am zhig pa zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: spyod pa 'di nyams pa'am zhig pa zhes bya ba rtogs par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood that this practice is impaired or destroyed.

original: dge slob ma nyid 'byung ba 'di la dus gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: dge slob ma nyid 'byung ba 'di la dus gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the period of time for becoming a probationary nun?

original: de'i phyir bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang por der ma lon pa'i dang po la skye'o zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang por der ma lon pa'i dang po la skye'o zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore, the text says, ‚ÄúThe first moment of the time of full ordination when the first moment of that has not yet arisen.‚Äù

original: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i @49a * //
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i @49a * //
translated: The first moment of the time of full ordination is the time of full ordination.

original: dus so ; / de ni dang po gnyis yin te /üîΩgzhon nu ma nyid la lo nyi shu dang khyim so bzung ba'i lo bcu gnyis so //üîΩspyad pa'i dus des lo gnyis kyis ma chog pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po'o //
analyzed: dus so ; / de ni dang po gnyis yin te / gzhon nu ma nyid la lo nyi shu dang khyim so bzung ba'i lo bcu gnyis so // spyad pa'i dus des lo gnyis kyis ma chog pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po'o //
translated: The first two moments are the first moment of the time of full ordination when the first moment of that has not yet arisen.üîΩThe first moment of the time of full ordination when the first moment of that has not yet arisen is the time of full ordination when the time of practice is not complete by two years.

original: des ma chog pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po dus 'di la yod pas na dus de ma tshang ba'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po'i dang po ste /
analyzed: des ma chog pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po dus 'di la yod pas na dus de ma tshang ba'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus kyi dang po'i dang po ste /
translated: The first moment of the time of full ordination when the time of practice is not complete by two years is the first moment of the time of full ordination when the time of practice is incomplete.

original: dge slob ma nyid skye ba'i dus 'di'o //
analyzed: dge slob ma nyid skye ba'i dus 'di'o //
translated: The time of the arising of the state of a probationary nun is this time.

original: gzhon nu ma la lo bco brgyad nyid dang khyim so bzung ba'i lo bcu nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma la lo bco brgyad nyid dang khyim so bzung ba'i lo bcu nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the words ‚Äúeighteen years as a novice and ten years as a householder‚Äù is that the time of practice is not complete by two years.

original: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las khyim so bzung ba'i gang yin pa de ni lo bcu lon pa'am /
analyzed: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong ma'i rnam par 'byed pa las khyim so bzung ba'i gang yin pa de ni lo bcu lon pa'am /
translated: One who has taken up the life of a householder is ten years old.

original: gzhon nu mar gyur pa ni lo bco brgyad lon te /
analyzed: gzhon nu mar gyur pa ni lo bco brgyad lon te /
translated: One who is a girl is eighteen years old.

original: de gnyis la lo bcu gnyis su dge slob ma'i sdom pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis la lo bcu gnyis su dge slob ma'i sdom pa sbyin par bya'o zhes bya ba gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Both of these should be given the vows of a probationary nun for twelve years.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus ni 'dir 'grub par khas blangs pa'i khyad par brjod par bya ste /üîΩde'i phyir khyim so bzung ba bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i lo rnams kyi dang po ni lo bcu gnyis nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dus ni 'dir 'grub par khas blangs pa'i khyad par brjod par bya ste / de'i phyir khyim so bzung ba bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i lo rnams kyi dang po ni lo bcu gnyis nyid do zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: The time for full ordination is the time for accepting full ordination.üîΩTherefore it is said: The first year for full ordination of a householder is twelve years.

original: bud med khyim so bzung ba bag mang btang ba gang yin pa de'i bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i dus de'i lo rnams kyi dang po ni lo bcu gnyis lon pa nyid do ;
analyzed: bud med khyim so bzung ba bag mang btang ba gang yin pa de'i bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba'i dus de'i lo rnams kyi dang po ni lo bcu gnyis lon pa nyid do ;
translated: The first year for full ordination of a female householder who has been given in marriage is twelve years.

original: / sbyin pa las skye'o zhes bya ba ni dge slob ma nyid la zhes bya bar rjes su 'brel to //
analyzed: / sbyin pa las skye'o zhes bya ba ni dge slob ma nyid la zhes bya bar rjes su 'brel to //
translated: The phrase arises from giving is connected to the phrase the state of being a probationary nun.

original: sus sbyin pa las she na /
analyzed: sus sbyin pa las she na /
translated: By whom is it given?

original: de'i phyir dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis so zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir dge slong ma'i dge 'dun gyis so zhes bya ba smos so //

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /

original: de'i sbyin pa ni slob pa'i sdom pa zhes bya bas so zhes smos te /
analyzed: de'i sbyin pa ni slob pa'i sdom pa zhes bya bas so zhes smos te /
translated: It is said, her giving is the vow of training.

original: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di bslab pa'i sdom pa gsol na ji srid du dge 'dun de la bslab pa'i sdom pa byin cig ces bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags las 'byung ba yin no //

translated: If this person named so-and-so requests the vow of training, for as long as the community gives the vow of training to her, etc.üîΩ After that, the training should be explained.

original: de'i 'og tu bslab pa brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa 'di'i rjes la bslab pa brjod par bya ba ni chos drug dang ; rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu bslab pa brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i sdom pa sbyin pa 'di'i rjes la bslab pa brjod par bya ba ni chos drug dang ; rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug ste /
translated: After this giving of the vow of training, the training should be explained, which consists of the six rules and the six corresponding rules.

original: de la chos drug rnams gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos drug rnams gang zhe na /

original: de'i phyir / gcig pu lam du 'gro mi bya //
analyzed: de'i phyir / gcig pu lam du 'gro mi bya //
translated: Therefore, it is said, One should not go on the road alone.

original: chu bo'i pha rol brgal mi bya //
analyzed: chu bo'i pha rol brgal mi bya //
translated: One should not cross a river.

original: skyes pa la ni reg mi bya //
analyzed: skyes pa la ni reg mi bya //
translated: One should not touch a man.

original: de dang khyim gcig nyal mi bya //üîΩsmyan du 'gyur ba mi bya zhing //
analyzed: de dang khyim gcig nyal mi bya // smyan du 'gyur ba mi bya zhing //
translated: One should not sleep in the same room as a man.üîΩOne should not act as a matchmaker.

original: kha na ma tho bca' mi bya //üîΩ'di ltar @49b 'di rnams dge slob ma'i //
analyzed: kha na ma tho bca' mi bya // 'di ltar @49b 'di rnams dge slob ma'i //
translated: One should not commit a misdeed.üîΩThus, these are the six rules

original: chos rnams drug por yongs su grags //
analyzed: chos rnams drug por yongs su grags //
translated: For a probationary nun.

original: rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug gang zhe na /üîΩsa le sbram la gzung mi bya //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug gang zhe na / sa le sbram la gzung mi bya //

original: mdoms kyi spu ni breg mi bya //üîΩsa yang brko bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: mdoms kyi spu ni breg mi bya // sa yang brko bar mi bya ste /
translated: One should not shave the pubic hair.üîΩOne should not dig the earth.

original: rtsva sngon dag kyang gcad mi bya //
analyzed: rtsva sngon dag kyang gcad mi bya //
translated: One should not cut grass.

original: byin len ma byas bza' mi bya //
analyzed: byin len ma byas bza' mi bya //

original: gsog 'jog byas pa bza' mi bya //
analyzed: gsog 'jog byas pa bza' mi bya //

original: rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug 'di //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i chos drug 'di //
translated: These six proper Dharmas

original: dge slob ma la slob phyir bshad //
analyzed: dge slob ma la slob phyir bshad //

original: tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa ma thob par bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa ma thob par bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: 'dir bsnyen par rdzogs pa ni tshangs par spyod pa'o //

original: de la nye bar gnas pa ni nye bar skye bar byed pa'o //
analyzed: de la nye bar gnas pa ni nye bar skye bar byed pa'o //

original: tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir sdom pa ni tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir sdom pa ni tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa'o //
translated: The vow for the purpose of abiding in pure conduct is the vow for abiding in pure conduct.

original: gang gis de ma thob pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa ma thob pa ste de la'o //
analyzed: gang gis de ma thob pa de ni tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa ma thob pa ste de la'o //
translated: One who has not obtained that is one who has not obtained the vow for abiding in pure conduct.

original: bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba ni gang gi phyir 'di rnams kyi sdom pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i don du ste /
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba ni gang gi phyir 'di rnams kyi sdom pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i don du ste /

analyzed: zhing nyid du nges par byed pa de las 'di ma thob par ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma yin no //

original: gang gi tshe 'di blang zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'di blang zhe na /

original: de'i phyir gsang ste bstan pa'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis de sbyin par bya'o zhes smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsang ste bstan pa'i 'og tu dge 'dun gyis de sbyin par bya'o zhes smos te /
translated: Therefore it is said, ‚ÄúAfter the secret instruction, the Sa·πÖgha should give it.‚Äù

original: tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa de sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: tshangs par spyod pa la nye bar gnas pa'i sdom pa de sbyin par bya'o //
translated: That vow for abiding in pure conduct should be given.üîΩBy whom?

original: sus she na de'i phyir /
analyzed: sus she na de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore it is said,

original: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba smos te /

original: ci zhig 'di tsam nyid kyis 'di sbyin nam zhe na /
analyzed: ci zhig 'di tsam nyid kyis 'di sbyin nam zhe na /

original: de'i phyir bar chad dris so zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: ba 'di la yang bsko ba rig pa'i ngo bo yin te /

original: chos gos dag ni lnga nyid do //
analyzed: chos gos dag ni lnga nyid do //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dge slong ma la ni chos gos gsum thun mong yin te /

analyzed: zhes bya ba bzhi po rnams lhag pa yin no // lci ba'i chos rnams brjod par bya'o zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: lci ba'i chos brgyad po rnams brjod par bya ste /

analyzed: de rnams kyang /

analyzed: dge slong rnams las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / gnyen po'i tshogs dang gdams ngag yongs tshol dang // dge slong med par gnas par byed pa dang // gang du yang ni dbyar gnas khas len dang // rgud pa rnams la dge slong bskul ba dang //

analyzed: de'i phyir ltung bar 'gyur ba dang / dge sbyong byed pa'i bar skabs su'o //

analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa po rnams kyis kyang rab tu dbyung bar bya ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: drug po de dag @50b gang zhe na /

analyzed: de'i phyir mtshan gnyis pa'o //

translated: This is the questioning of one who has come for ordination, from ‚ÄúAre you one with two organs?‚Äù up to ‚ÄúAre you not one who was previously a monk?‚Äù

analyzed: bya'o // ji srid 'di la skye ba'i chos nyid med pa zhes bya ba 'dir tshul 'di rtogs par bya'o //

analyzed: // / mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba ba dang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa gnyis ni sdom pa'i zhing nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba ni mi'i 'gro ba pa las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba gzhan las skyes pa dang / mi'i 'gro ba nyid yin du zin kyang byang gi sgra mi snyan pa ni sdom pa'i zhing nyid ma yin te / de gnyis la sdom pa mi skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that vows do not arise from birth in any realm other than the human realm, and even though one is born in the human realm, vows do not arise in those of the northern continent of Kuru.üîΩAlso, those who change sex three times do not have vows.

analyzed: pa mi skye'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: This means that vows do not arise in those who change sex three times.üîΩVows do not degenerate in the first two.

original: phran tshegs las cho ga gnyis pa 'di 'dra ba nas drangs pa'o //

translated: This is the second rite of this kind cited in the K·π£udraka-vinaya.

original: len pa nyid na lang skye'o zhes bya ba ni sdom pa yang dag par len pa nyid la de'i tshe na mtshan gyur na yang sdom pa skye ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: len pa nyid na lang skye'o zhes bya ba ni sdom pa yang dag par len pa nyid la de'i tshe na mtshan gyur na yang sdom pa skye ba nyid yin no //
translated: When one receives the precepts, one becomes a layperson. When one receives the precepts of full ordination, at that time even if one‚Äôs sex changes, one still receives the precepts.

translated: The Buddha said,üîΩ‚ÄúOne should say that person has received full ordination.

analyzed: dge slong mas ni dge slong rnams las bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong ma'i dngos po yongs su btsal bar bya ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Because a bhik·π£u·πáƒ´ seeks the state of a bhik·π£u·πáƒ´ through full ordination with bhik·π£us.‚Äù

original: 'di pho'i mtshan gyur pa ni dpe tsam du zad do //
analyzed: 'di pho'i mtshan gyur pa ni dpe tsam du zad do //
translated: Here the change of a male‚Äôs sex is merely an example.

original: gzhan du cho ga 'di la @51a * //
analyzed: gzhan du cho ga 'di la @51a * //
translated: In other cases,

original: shin tu dogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu dogs pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //

original: bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur pa'i gnas skabs can 'di ni bsnyen par rdzogs par lta ba gzung ba ste /
analyzed: bsnyen par rdzogs par gyur pa'i gnas skabs can 'di ni bsnyen par rdzogs par lta ba gzung ba ste /
